private int port

Port to use to connect to the RabbitMQ broker.

Sets the requested heartbeat delay, in seconds, that the server sends in the connection.tune frame.

Whether the connection uses SSL.

Number of concurrent threads (0 is unlimited).

requestedHeartbeat

private int requestedHeartbeat
Sets the requested heartbeat delay, in seconds, that the server sends in the connection.tune frame. 5 is the RabbitMQ default. 0 means unlimited.

private boolean ssl
Whether the connection uses SSL.

getRequestedHeartbeat

int getRequestedHeartbeat()
Returns the requested heartbeat delay, in seconds, that the server sends in the connection.tune frame. If set to 0, heartbeats are disabled.

getSsl

boolean getSsl()
Returns whether to use SSL.

getThreads

int getThreads()
Returns the maximum number of concurrent consumer threads that are processed. 5 is the RabbitMQ default. 0 means unlimited.

getUsername

java.lang.String getUsername()
Returns the RabbitMQ username.

Returns the RabbitMQ virtual host.
